properties.Comment: An extensive search was completed in this area as demonstrated highly suitable habitat for Fulgensia fulgens. Despite a failed attempt, a DMP (8) was established to ensure repeat monitoring in this area. See DMP 8 for more info.
properties.Species: Agonimia gelatinosa, Cladonia pocillum, Cladonia rangiformis, Collema auriforme, C. tenax var. tenax, Diploschistes muscorum, Leptogium pulvinatum, Leptogium turgidum, Peltigera neckeri, Peltigera rufescens, Peltigera rufescens, Rhizocarpon petraeum,  Sarcosagium campestre var. campestre

properties.Comment: This area was searched for suitable habitat for Fulgensia fulgens. Although diverse botanically, this was not the case for lichens. See target note 1 and 2 for more info.
properties.Species: Cladonia furcata, C.pocillum, C. rangiformis, Leptogium pulvinatum,  Peltigera rufescens

properties.Comment: An attempt was made to refind Collema bachmanianum recorded in 2013 by Douglass & Coppins. There was a failed search attempt for this species at this site. See target note 3 and 4 for more info.
properties.Species: Caloplaca marmorata, Cladonia rangiformis, Leptogium gelatinosum, L. pulvinatum, Peltigera canina, Protoblastenia rupestris, Rhizocarpon petraeum,  Verrucaria nigrescens f. nigrescens

properties.Comment: This was a small area investigated but was unsuitable for Fulgensia fulgens.

This area was targeted due to the highlighted interest by Barbara Benfield in 2007, where she documented Sticta limbata on ten willows at SS 46369 34398. Unfortunately, much of the area surveyed in 2023 was completely impenetrable, where reasonable sized Salix were becoming hemmed in by younger growth.
properties.Species: Bacidia arceutina, Flavoparmelia caperata, Japewiella tavaresiana, Lecidella elaeochroma, Lichenochora aipoliae, Normandina acroglypta, Normandina pulchella, Opegrapha vulgata, Parmotrema perlatum, Physcia aipolia, Porina aenea,  Pyrrhospora quernea

properties.Site Name: Salix east of the American Road
properties.Species: Arthonia radiata, Diploicia canescens, Flavoparmelia caperata, Hypogymnia physodes, Japewiella tavaresiana, Lecanora hybocarpa, Lecidella elaeochroma, Melanelixia glabratula, Normandina acroglypta, Normandina pulchella, Parmelia sulcata, Parmotrema perlatum, Peltigera praetextata, Phlyctis argena, Physcia adscendens, Physcia aipolia, Physcia leptalea, Physconia distorta, Punctelia jeckeri, Pyrenula chlorospila, Pyrrhospora quernea, Ramalina farinacea, Ramalina fastigiata,  Xanthoria parietina

properties.Site Name: Salix south of main car park
properties.Species: Anisomeridium biforme, Evernia prunastri, Flavoparmelia caperata, Hypogymnia physodes, Lecidella elaeochroma, Melanelixia subaurifera, Normandina acroglypta, Normandina pulchella, Opegrapha atra, Parmelia sulcata, Parmotrema perlatum, Phlyctis argena, Physcia leptalea, Ramalina calicaris, Ramalina canariensis, Ramalina farinacea,  Xanthoria parietina
